sentences.en: Aeration is a tank where microorganism decompose organism in waste water.
sentences.cn: 曝气池是栖息在活性污泥中的微生物分解污水中有机物的场所.

sentences.en: All substances, except those which decompose when heated, may be changed from one state into another.
sentences.cn: 所有物质, 除了一加热就分解的以外, 都可以以一种状态变为另一种状态.

sentences.en: And thus it does not tend to decompose vapors to the same extent.
sentences.cn: 这样在某种程序上不致于析出蒸汽.

sentences.en: As the glycerides in fat slowly decompose the acid value increases.
sentences.cn: 酸值随着脂肪中的甘油酯缓慢分解而升高.

sentences.en: As the waste materials decompose, they produce methane gas.
sentences.cn: 废物腐烂时会产生沼气。
潮湿的空气可以使衣服腐烂.

sentences.en: How to Decompose Indicators of GDP Energy Intensity Reduction?
sentences.cn: GDP能耗降低指标如何分解?

sentences.en: Many chemicals will partially decompose when autoclaved.
sentences.cn: 高压消毒时许多化学药品会受到一些破坏.

sentences.en: Most animals decompose very quickly after death.
sentences.cn: 大多数动物死后很快腐烂.

sentences.en: The composer were proposed decompose his composition into components.
sentences.cn: 作曲家被提议将著作分解成单元.

sentences.en: The debris slowly decomposes into compost.
sentences.cn: 这些垃圾慢慢地分解成了堆肥。

sentences.en: The egg begins to decompose after a day in the sun.
sentences.cn: 鸡蛋在阳光下放了一天后开始变坏.

sentences.en: Thermodynamic analysis shows that wolframite not only can be decompose.
sentences.cn: 热力学分析结果表明:黑钨矿既可以被酸分解,又可以被碱分解.

sentences.en: These will immediately start to decompose and spread disease.
sentences.cn: 尸体会很快开始腐烂,传播疾病.

sentences.en: You can apply heat to decompose organic compounds.
sentences.cn: 你可以加热来分解有机化合物.

trans.tran_en: to decay or make something decay
